title: Eva Krockow
subtitle:
On my walk to work this morning, I finished the audio book of The Beekeeper of Aleppo.
A beautiful tale of strength in the face of extreme hardship. The story of Nuri and Afra, two refugees from Syria, will stay with me for a long time.

https://www.amazon.co.uk/Beekeeper-Aleppo-Christy-Lefteri/dp/1785768921/ref=tmm_hrd_swatch_0?_encoding=UTF8&qid=1568360615&sr=8-1¬†‚Ä¶pic.twitter.com/WqeZrwQSFe

title: Yasir Hameed
subtitle: I had the pleasure to participate in a focus group with refugees in Norwich led by Dr Emily Clark, a GP & a researcher @uniofeastanglia  &Anne from @EnglishPlus_Nrw. title: Migrant Help
subtitle:
RefuNet offers free online English lessons for refugees and asylum seekers. Students can be at any level and will be matched to a teacher. The programme is flexible - teachers aim to get to know the student first and tailor lessons to their needs. 
Visit https://www.refunet.co.uk/¬†pic.twitter.com/tAlHjah4Df

title: Kelly T. Clements
subtitle: #Milwaukee is a shining example of a city #WithRefugees - welcoming refugees for more than a hundred years.
